description: This dashboard visualizes key APK Adapter metrics, including CPU usage, memory consumption, and garbage collector activity.

panels.description: Number of available central processing units
panels.title: Available CPUs

panels.description: This represents the amount of memory of free physical memory in the host (free = total – (used + shared + cached + buffered))
panels.title: Free Memory

panels.description: Represents the current load of CPU in the host system in last minute.
panels.title: System Load Average [1 Min]

panels.description: Represents the CPU load in this process
panels.title: CPU Load

panels.description: Represents the current load of CPU in the host system for the last 'x' minutes.
panels.title: System Load Average

panels.description: Percentage memory usage of the system
panels.title: Memory Usage

title: APK Adapter
